package.name: Jumper

dependencies.package: mobilesubstrate, firmware (>= 11.1), ws.hbang.common (>= 1.12), com.rpetrich.rocketbootstrap (>= 1.0.9), applist, unzip, com.a3tweaks.flipswitch (>= 1.0.16~beta7)

package.shortDescription: Launch applications from the lock screen

descriptionlist.description:
Jumper will add iPhone X-style buttons to the lock screen, which can be configured to launch applications and turn modules on / off.
Not compatible with HomeGesture and LittleXS.
If you get the missing dependencies error, add the https://creaturecoding.com/repo/ repository.
